data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_010_0
data.text: LIKE A FLASH, ROBIN AND LITTLE- JOHN RACE FOR AN EXIT, THE GUARDS CLOSE ON THEIR HEELS ...AND AT THAT MOMENT, LITTLE- JOHON'S FEET SLIP ON THE FOOD STREWIN ON THE FLOOR...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_010_1
data.text: SEIZE THEM! CUT THEM DOWN! DONT'T LET THEM ESCAPE !

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_010_3
data.text: GO ON! GET AWAY IF YOU CAN! DON'T BOTHER ABOUT ME!

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_010_4
data.text:
FIERCELY THE GUARDS FALL ON
                THE PRONE GIANT...AND ROBIN, ALMOST
                CLEAR OF THE ROOM, GALLANTLY TURNS BACK TO
                HELP HIS FRIENDS...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_010_5
data.text: WITH FISTS LASHING OUT RIGHT AND LEFT, THE OUT- LAW CHIEF HURLS HIMSELF AT THE GUARDS...BUT HE KNOWS THE ODDS ARE HOPELESS...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_010_6
data.text: THE STRUGGLE IS BRIEF... SOON THEY ARE HELPLESS PRISONERS. AND THE ERRL, DANCING IN RAGE, IS HEAPING ABUSE ON THEM...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_010_7
data.text: WRETCHES ! DOLTS ! ASSASSINS ! YOU'VE MADE ME THE LAUGHING STOCK OF MY FRIENDS ! TO THE DUNGEONS WITH THEM ! ON THE MORROW THEY SUFFER FOR THIS!

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_010_8
data.text: ROUGKLY, THEY ARE HURLED INTO A DUN- GEON CELL...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_010_9
data.text: 'TIS A PRETTY FIX WE'RE IN, SIRE ! WHAT IS THE PENALTY FOR SPILLING SOUP ON AN EARL ?

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_010_10
data.text: DIRE TORTURES, I FEAR ME, LITTLEJOHON! RH, WELL, I CAME TO SEE THE EARL'S CASTLE AND SEE IT I DID...EVEN TO THE DUNGEON...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_010_11
data.text:
RUEFULLY BUT UNDAUNTED THEY
                CONSIDER THEIR PLIGHT... 8
